snippet: A study released this week by the firm found that owners of hybrids were less inclined to purchase another one on their subsequent visit to the dealership.
abstract: A study released this week by the firm found that owners of hybrids were less inclined to purchase another one on their subsequent visit to the dealership.

headline.main: Polk Study: Over Time, Allure of Hybrid Ownership Wanes
headline.print_headline: The Blog: Few Hybrid Owners Buy Another
